mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_order_form_detail ( order_form_id, passenger_id, piao_type, ticket_no, checi, price, status ) VALUES ( #{orderFormId}, #{passengerId}, #{piaoType}, #{ticketNo}, #{checi}, #{price} #{status} );
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_order_form_detail SET order_form_id = #{orderFormId}, passenger_id = #{passengerId}, piao_type = #{piaoType}, ticket_no = #{ticketNo}, checi = #{checi}, price = #{price}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_order_form_detail WHERE order_form_id = #{orderFormId} AND passenger_id = #{passengerId} AND piao_type = #{piaoType}
